name: Viva Multi-Surface Cloth Paper Towels, Task Size - 12 Super Rolls (2 Packs of 6) - 81 Sheets Per Roll
short_description: 12 PAPER TOWEL SUPER ROLLS: 12 Viva Multi-Surface Cloth Paper Towel Super Rolls (2 packs of 6), 81 sheets per roll.
PAPER TOWELS FOR THE RIGHT CLEAN: Our cloth paper towels feature 4X Cleaning Power: remove dirt, scrub grime, absorb quickly, and lock liquid.
MULTI-SURFACE PAPER TOWELS: Each of these cloth paper towels traps mess 3x better when wet vs. our dry towel.
PAPER TOWELS WITH PERFORATIONS: Choose the right sheet size for the task thanks to perforated paper towels.
PAPER TOWELS WITH A UNIQUE TEXTURE: Unique texture to trap and toss mess.
product_description: Viva Multi-Surface Cloth Paper Towels feature a unique texture to lift and trap mess on kitchen countertops, bathroom surfaces and and more. Our cloth paper towels help you clean with 4x Cleaning Power: remove dirt, scrub grime, absorb quickly, and lock liquid. And you have plenty of paper towels to take care of messes: you get 2 packs of 6 rolls with 12 rolls total, 81 sheets per roll and perforations that let you choose the sheet size for your task. Each of these cloth paper towels traps mess 3x better when wet vs. our dry towel. Viva Multi-Surface Cloth also helps you clean because it's more absorbent* for multiple tasks. Plus our versatile cloth paper towels each have 2 absorbent layers to soak up mess and clean metal, granite, glass, and wood. Get a clean you can count on thanks to a unique texture to trap and toss mess. Viva towels are made with the environment in mind: Viva towels are sustainably sourced from responsibly managed forests. *vs. leading value brand

product_description: Scott Shop Towels Original are made by Scott, the #1 Shop Towel Brand. These blue shop towels absorb 2X more than the leading value brand paper towel for your everyday jobs. Scott Shop Towels Original are soft, absorbent and can be used for cleaning up oil spills, changing oil, refilling fluids and other general automotive maintenance. They can also be used to absorb large liquid spills and leaks, routine cleaning and maintenance and removing soils and liquids from face and hands (not for use on compromised skin). Available in a roll format or Pop-Up Box with a built-in handle, these perforated, cloth-like towels are portable for on-the-go jobs. Whether you own an automotive garage, are a DIY weekend warrior or working around the house, trust none other than the original blue shop towel, Scott Shop Towels Original, made by Scott, the #1 Shop Towel Brand (Circana, Retail Tracking Service, U.S. Sales, 2021 & 2022.).
